reviewtext: Pro: An excellent all-around performer. Good deal under $300.Con: Cable sub classNotes:To unleash full potential of these high impedance studio cans, you need another 1000-2000 dollar investment on DAC and ampiliers (pre and/or power level). These cans are basically rubbish-in-rubbish-out, so forget about plugging them into your portable devices or entry level AV receivers, it will disappoint you.
